title: Mug Shot Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An eclectic cozy cafe where the chef always has a vegan special menu on Wednesdays and always a vegan choice weekdays, plus has vegan ice cream. Very popular with local vegans. Gluten free available. Serves Lavazza coffee. Located very close to St Mary's Cathedral.
